title: Understanding Error Codes
text: Error codes are used to indicate that something went wrong in a program or system. They help identify the type of error that occurred.

title: Types of Error Codes
text: Error codes can represent various issues, such as syntax errors, runtime errors, or logical errors. They help in debugging and fixing problems.

hintAnswer: things that could not exist (for example, a formula dividing a number by 0)
title: Identifying Error Codes
text: Which of the following best describes error codes?
choices: things that could not exist (for example, a formula dividing a number by 0)
